title: Records from 9/8/2006 shooting at South Hills High School

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The incident report, police narratives, and any investigative reports produced in relation to the 9/8/2006 shooting at South Hills High School in Fort Worth. The shooting is referenced in this article: https://www.myplainview.com/news/article/Teenager-shot-at-Fort-Worth-high-school-8535115.php.

In the event that there are fees, I would request a waiver, as I am a member of the press.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Prayag Gordy

title: T.M. Peirce Elementary School 2/11/2004 shooting incident report

communications.subject: Pennsylvania Right to Know Act Request: T.M. Peirce Elementary School 2/11/2004 shooting incident report
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

The incident report, police narratives, and any investigative reports produced in relation to the 2/11/2004 shooting near T.M. Peirce Elementary School in Philadelphia. The shooting is referenced in this article: https://www.thedp.com/article/2004/02/two-men-charged-with-shooting-n-phila-boy. Kennell Spady, then 19, and Kareem Johnson, then 20, were charged.

In the event that there are fees, I would request a waiver, as I am a member of the press.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Prayag Gordy
